items.sentence: I can\'t hug Tom if he doesn\'t want to be hugged.
Tom accidentally knocked over the bottle of water.
Tom added a few finishing touches to the painting.
Tom always hugs his son when he returns from work.
Tom and Mary always speak to each other in French.
You wouldn\'t be in trouble if it weren\'t for me.
You\'ll have to ask Tom about that. I don\'t know.
You\'re a better swimmer than Tom is, aren\'t you?
It\'s raining, and we forgot to close the windows.
It\'s strange that she came home so late at night.
